modules.description: Provides functions to transform local identifiers into global ones during code generation, with support for tracking and resolving symbol references. Operates on OCaml AST nodes and symbol tables, enabling seamless integration of generated code into larger projects. Used to ensure consistency in multi-file builds and to avoid name clashes in generated modules.

Provides a transformation function that modifies syntax trees to promote local values to global scope, operating on OCaml abstract syntax structures. Works with Ppxlib.Deriving.t to inject global declarations during code expansion. Used to enable cross-module access to locally defined values during macro processing.
